Clients
Class ACSClient

java.lang.Object
  Clients.ACSClient
Direct Known Subclasses:
ACSStatus, ACSStatus, AlmaStatus, AlmaStatus, AntennaStatus, AntennaStatus, ContainerStatus, CorbaStatus, CorbaStatus, DevicesStatus, SubsystemsStatus, SubsystemStatus
public abstract class ACSClient
extends java.lang.Object

This class have the common method to write something on ACS Logger, also, is used to generalize the kind of report, thats why, all that you need to integrate another new status is extends this class and later add a new instance of the extended class to the corresponding list, Online or Offline info.

Author:
Andres Villalobos, 2011 Summerjob, Ingenieria de ejecucion en Computacion e Informatica, Universidad Catolica del norte
See Also:
The project Twiki page and my Dailylog please Contact to a.e.v.r.007@gmail.com

public abstract java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> getStatus()

isAcsOnline

protected boolean isAcsOnline()
This method make the ping to the Manager

Returns:

  • false : If manager is down
